name: Vayne
title: the Night Hunter
lore: Shauna Vayne is a deadly, remorseless Demacian monster hunter, who has dedicated her life to finding and destroying the demon that murdered her family. Armed with a wrist-mounted crossbow and a heart full of vengeance, she is only truly happy when slaying practitioners or creations of the dark arts, striking from the shadows with a flurry of silver bolts.
blurb: Shauna Vayne is a deadly, remorseless Demacian monster hunter, who has dedicated her life to finding and destroying the demon that murdered her family. Armed with a wrist-mounted crossbow and a heart full of vengeance, she is only truly happy when...
allytips: Tumble has many uses, but it cannot pass over walls.
Condemn can be used to both pin targets to walls to ensure a kill, or to escape a pursuer.
Don't go in first to a large teamfight. Wait for your teammates to initiate.
enemytips: Vayne is fragile - turn the pressure up on her and she will be forced to play cautiously.
Deny Vayne the opportunity to pin you against walls.

riot_spells.name: Tumble
riot_spells.description: Vayne tumbles, maneuvering to carefully place her next shot. Her next attack deals bonus damage.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Vayne rolls a short distance, and deals {{ adratiobonus }} bonus physical damage on her next basic attack within {{ duration }} seconds.

Tumble's bonus damage is equal to {{ totaladratio*100 }}% of her Attack Damage

riot_spells.name: Silver Bolts
riot_spells.description: Vayne tips her bolts with a rare metal, toxic to evil things. The third consecutive attack or ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target's max health as bonus true damage.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Every third consecutive attack or ability against an enemy deals an additional {{ maxhealthratio*100 }}% of the enemy's maximum health as true damage (no less than {{ damagefloor }})

Silver Bolts deals no more than {{ damagemaxvsmonsters }} damage against monsters.

riot_spells.name: Condemn
riot_spells.description: Vayne draws a heavy crossbow from her back, and fires a huge bolt at her target, knocking them back and dealing damage. If they collide with terrain, they are impaled, dealing bonus damage and stunning them.
riot_spells.tooltip: Fires a bolt that knocks back a target and deals {{ totaldamage }} damage. If the target collides with terrain, the damage is increased by {{ stundamage*100 }}% and the target is stunned for {{ stunduration }} seconds.

riot_spells.name: Final Hour
riot_spells.description: Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, Invisibility during Tumble, reduced Tumble cooldown, and more bonus Movement Speed from Night Hunter
riot_spells.tooltip:
Vayne gains {{ bonusattackdamage }} bonus attack damage and improvements to Night Hunter and Tumble for {{ baseduration }} seconds. The Duration of Final Hour is extended by {{ durationtoadd }} seconds whenever a champion damaged by Vayne dies within {{ damagedmarkerduration }} seconds.

Night Hunter: Vayne instead gains {{ movementspeed }} movement speed
Tumble: Tumble's cooldown is reduced by {{ tumblecdreduction }}%, and Vayne gains Invisibility for {{ tumblestealthduration }} second when she Tumbles.

Stealth - Invisible: Vayne can only be revealed by nearby enemy turrets or True Sight.
Final Hour's duration can't be increased beyond its original maximum duration

riot_passive.name: Night Hunter
riot_passive.description: Vayne ruthlessly hunts evil-doers, gaining 30 movement speed when moving toward nearby enemy champions.

i1.name: Night Hunter
i1.blurb: Vayne ruthlessly hunts evil-doers, gaining 30 movement speed when moving toward nearby enemy champions.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Vayne''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|30 '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} when moving towards a nearby {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy champion.
i1.description2: {{sbc|{{ai|Final Hour|Vayne}}:}} ''Night Hunter's'' '''bonus''' movement speed is tripled to 90.
i1.notes:
* ''Vayne'' does not need to be moving to trigger ''Night Hunter''.
* ''Night Hunter's'' bonus movement speed persists for 2 seconds after ''Vayne'' loses {{tip|sight}} of an enemy champion.
* ''Night Hunter'' interacts with movement speed modifiers.

q1.name: Tumble
q1.blurb: Vayne tumbles, maneuvering to carefully place her next shot. Her next attack critically strikes.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Vayne''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} forward, though not through terrain, and her next [[basic attack]] within 7 seconds deals {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}}.
q1.description3: {{sbc|{{ai|Final Hour|Vayne}}:}} ''Tumble's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced by {{pp|type=[[File:Final Hour.png|20px|link=]] Final Hour Rank|key=%|3|30 to 50|1 to 3}}, and ''Tumble'' turns '''Vayne''' {{tip|invisibility|invisible}} for 1 second on-cast.
q1.notes:
* The enhanced attack applies [[on-hit effect]]s, {{sti|life steal}}, affects [[turret]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal. The bonus damage however cannot.
* Although ''Tumble'' will reset the basic attack timer, Vayne cannot attack until the animation is complete.
* ''Tumble's'' {{tip|invisibility}} during {{ai|Final Hour|Vayne}} will end prematurely if ''Vayne'' performs any action other than movement while stealthed.
* ''Tumble's'' enhanced attack can be {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}, or {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}} and can {{tip|blind|miss}}.

w1.name: Silver Bolts
w1.blurb: Vayne tips her bolts with a rare metal, toxic to evil things. The third consecutive attack or ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target's maximum Health as bonus true damage. (Max: 200 damage vs. Monsters)
w1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Vayne's''' [[basic attacks]] and {{ai|Condemn|Vayne}} apply a ''Silver Bolts'' stack for {{fd|3.5}} seconds, up to 3 times. Attacking a new enemy removes all stacks from the previous target.
w1.description2: The third stack consumes them all to deal {{tip|true damage|{{as|'''bonus''' true damage}}}}, with a minimum threshold, and capped at 200 against monsters.
w1.leveling2:
{{st|Bonus True Damage|{{as|{{ap|4 to 14}}% of target's '''maximum''' health}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Minimum True Damage|{{as|{{ap|50 to 110}}|true damage}}}}
w1.notes:
* Stacks are not removed if ''Vayne'' switches to attacking a target immune to ''Silver Bolts'' (structures, [[ward]]s).
* ''Silver Bolts'' only applies stacks to the primary target if ''Vayne'' has purchased {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}}.
* The third attack consumes all stacks even if the target is {{tip|untargetable}}.

e1.name: Condemn
e1.blurb: Vayne draws a heavy crossbow from her back, and fires a huge bolt at her target, knocking them back and dealing damage. If they collide with terrain, they are impaled, dealing bonus damage and stunning them.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Vayne''' fires a heavy bolt at the target unit, dealing {{as|physical damage}}, {{tip|airborne|knocking them back}} 475 units, and applying a {{ai|Silver Bolts|Vayne}} stack.
e1.description2: If the target collides with a wall, they take {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and are {{tip|stun|stunned}} for {{ap|1.5}} seconds.
e1.notes:
* ''Condemn'' uses {{tip|edge range}} (same as ''Vayne's'' basic attacks).
* ''Condemn's'' {{tip|airborne|displacement}} direction is determined when the projectile hits (will follow the line both ''Vayne'' and her target draw at that specific moment).
* ''Condemn's'' {{tip|stun}} duration starts when ''Vayne's'' target collides with a wall (they can be disabled for up to 2 seconds depending on {{tip|airborne|displacement}} duration based on distance traveled).
* {{sbc|Possible Bug:}} ''Condemn'' will not always interrupt enemy {{tip|suppression}} on ''Vayne's'' allies (sometimes they remain affected even if the enemy champion responsible is {{tip|airborne|displaced}} as far as outside ability range).
* The secondary damage ''Condemn's'' target takes when they collide with a wall is considered {{as|critical strike damage}}.
* ''Condemn'' interacts with player-created terrain ({{ai|Crystallize|Anivia}}, {{ai|Emperor's Divide|Azir}}, {{cai|Cataclysm|Jarvan IV}}, {{ai|Pillar of Ice|Trundle}}).

r1.name: Final Hour
r1.blurb: Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, Invisibility during Tumble, and triple the bonus Movement Speed from Night Hunter.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} For a duration, '''Vayne''' gains {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}} and triples {{ais|Night Hunter|Vayne}} bonus.
r1.description2: Additionally, {{ai|Tumble|Vayne}} gains cooldown reduction, and casting it grants {{tip|invisibility}} for 1 second.
r1.description3: While active, whenever a champion damaged by '''Vayne''' dies within 3 seconds, ''Final Hour's'' duration is extended by 4 seconds, up to a maximum of the original duration.
r1.notes:
* ''Final Hour'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Vayne's'' previous orders.
* ''Vayne's'' animations and basic attack projectiles change slightly during ''Final Hour''.
